name: BookIt.com Web Developer
description: At BookIt.com, I spent my time working on various features of their site while also contributing to their major site redesign code named 'Facelift'. I primarily dabbled in the HTML, CSS, Javascript for the front end and PHP and MySQL for the backend.

name: Riptide Web Developer
description: At Riptide, I worked primarily on their Elements platform which was an e-learning web application. The application used a variety of languages and tools but the ones that I dealt with were AngularJs, LESS, some Photoshop and some NodeJs.

name: LED Globe | Senior Project Team Member
description: This is a project that two other Electrical Engineering students and I completed for our Senior Design project for the EECS program. The LED Globe is a spinning apparatus in a shape of a sphere and it contains 90 LEDs in order to show images in complex arrays(or simple ones like names and letters). There were three main components that my group and I split up this project into and they are the mechanical, electical and the codeing side of things. I was put in charge of the coding side. The code was a combination of C and java and we used an Ardiuno development board and IDE to implement our code. I was writing code in order to help the microcontroller communicate with the infrared sensor as well as the 34 shift registers. I also wrote from scratch the bitmaps to display the images on the 90 LEDs. I was also in charge of designing the website. If you click the picture to the right, it will take you to the hastily-built-in-one-night website that I made. At the website, you can see more of me and my group's project in action.

name: Trevisani Oral Surgery and Dental Implants | IT/AV Office Position
description: Dr. Trevisani put me in charge of creating various sitting room commercials highlighting his work and his various offices throughout Orlando using the Adobe Creative Suite. I also provided consultation on his company website and altered the existing webpages to better market and appeal to Dr. Trevisani's cliente. Lastly, I had to assist and coordinate inter-office video communication between five different offices using the GoToMeeting web application.
